full_summary:
### SuperServer Kits or Equivalent for Department of National Defence
#### Solicitation Information
* Solicitation Number: BPM017664/21144
* Publication Date: 2022-12-15
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-01-10 14:00:00 (EST)

#### Tender Description
Shared Services Canada is seeking proposals for the provision of SuperServer Kits or equivalent for the Department of National Defence. The kits must meet the requirements outlined in the solicitation documents.

#### Contact Information
Please contact Chantal Deland, Contracting Officer, for further information.
* Email: [chantal.deland@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:chantal.deland@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 343-551-7304

#### Tender Documents
The tender documents are available for download at:
* [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/294865C3-F3AA-468E-8199-D98A488E647C](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/294865C3-F3AA-468E-8199-D98A488E647C)
* [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/95AB6588-1BD1-4C12-880A-C1CAF7A56D31](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/95AB6588-1BD1-4C12-880A-C1CAF7A56D31)
* [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/5CA1A189-9EB7-4C0C-8E0A-1DBA9CFF7572](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/5CA1A189-9EB7-4C0C-8E0A-1DBA9CFF7572)

#### Registration Requirement
To participate in this solicitation, bidders must register in the Shared Services Canada P2P Portal at [https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc
